original: Forslund, Melker, ingenjör, Linköping, f. 23/12/00 i Linköp. av smides-mäst. C. M. F. o. Sofia Karlsson. G. 25 m. Margareta Wastesson. Barn: Carin f. 26, Lennart 32. — Stud. v. Linköp. h. a. 1. samt ing:ex. 21. Ing. v. Forslunds Verkstäder sed. 37.
translated: Forslund, Melker, engineer, Linköping, b. 23/12/1900 in Linköping. Son of blacksmith master C.M.F. and Sofia Karlsson. Married to Margareta Wastesson in 1925. Children: Carin b. 1926, Lennart b. 1932. He studied at Linköping high school and passed the engineering exam in 1921. He worked as an engineer at Forslund's workshops since 1937.
